name: Charge Wars
description:
Due to the chaos in getting this submitted for the jam, we missed some asset URLs with absolute paths. Risking disqualification—judges, we can prove the build matches if you reach out—here is a link to the Vercel page of the build version submitted to the game jam: PLAY GAME HERE

Explore an arena of death and charge your way through successive waves of demons to outlive them.  How fast can you kill them all?

  • Use W S A D to move
  • Use Space to dash into enemies
  • Use number keys or clicks to select rewards at end of stage

Most assets original

  • Demon & Wolf enemy character from Warlock's Gauntlet.
  • Warlock's Gauntlet artists - rAum, jackFlower, DrZoliparia, Neil2D
